nodes.documentation: @return the negation of p, i.e. p.add(p.negate()) should be zero.
nodes.name: negate

nodes.documentation: @return the sum of two points of G1
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@return the product of a point on G1 and a scalar, i.e.
 p == p.mul(1) and p.add(p) == p.mul(2) for all points p.
nodes.name: mul
